channel.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
channel.description:
Heres my 2 cents.
>## [color = steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] >**[color = steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **Bind Soul (Day)-** Give a player death immunity. 1 use. **Circle of Life (Night)** - Choose a player. Anyone who visits them will be healed off attacks , nightshade and bleeding. 3 uses **Magic Link (Night)**- Choose two players. If they both visit each other tonight they will be immune to negative effects besides killing. Infinite Uses. _BD Goal idkkkk._
Subject to change. Defo subject to change. :>

item.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Thanks , but looking at other cw , suggestions , (like yours) made me reconsider my cw suggestion. Because of this , i made a new one , and im probably gonna make another one

My name is grey probably becuase it was changed by a mod , but my profile hasnt been

Read full topic

This would be permeant though (I’m pretty sure at least) which is very OP if given to prince and if phys used immune to poison/bleeding it would be near impossible to kill prince

item.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
CheesyKnives:

Bind Soul (Day)- Give a player death immunity. 1 use.

Like this, but when you get killed (maybe even converted) it should go away

CheesyKnives:

Circle of Life (Night) - Choose a player. Anyone who visits them will be healed off attacks , nightshade and bleeding. 3 uses

This is really interesting

CheesyKnives:

Magic Link (Night)- Choose two players. If they both visit each other tonight they will be immune to negative effects besides killing. Infinite Uses.

I like this but name should be changed so players don’t get confused with link minds xd

Read full topic

item.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
3DT_CheesyKnives:

Bind Soul (Day)- Give a player death immunity. 1 use.

Eh, feels like 1 use weak heal.

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Circle of Life (Night) - Choose a player. Anyone who visits them will be healed off attacks , nightshade and bleeding. 3 uses

I actually think this is pretty interesting. Very good power. Maybe more uses?

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Magic Link (Night)- Choose two players. If they both visit each other tonight they will be immune to negative effects besides killing. Infinite Uses.

Would almost never happen, so near useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
ty 4 ur feedbsck.

1 night rn , but youve given me some ideas :^)

Read full topic

item.title: Court Wizard Rework - CheesyKnives
item.dc:creator: ShaneNineOne
item.description:
Seems a bit too situational to me… night ability 2 requires two players visiting one another at night, which is not likely to reliably happen in most cases. Night ability 1 is also fairly situational, but an interesting concept for a support ability.

How long is Bind Life meant to last? A single night?

Read full topic
